data.comment: Ronaldo Henrique Silva (Recife PE) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Santos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Santos territory.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 5, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santos are pushing forward but Kaio Jorge's finish is wide of the goal.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Recife PE pushes forward through Marquinhos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marinho of Santos smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Santos in the half of Recife PE.
Santos have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 19, Attention is being given to Recife PE’s Elton and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Elton is back on his feet again.
In the minute 20, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Jonathan Gomez for Recife PE drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Recife PE's Elton is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Santos.
Adryelson is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 23, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marinho.
Recife PE’s Adryelson is on his feet again at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 24, Marinho for Santos is back on the field again.
Adryelson (Recife PE) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Santos push upfield and Luan Peres gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Recife PE defence.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Santos at Ilha do Retiro.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Santos.
In the minute 27, Recife PE's Bruninho is whistled for offside at Ilha do Retiro.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bruninho for Recife PE has been booked by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 32, Free kick Recife PE.
In Recife Santos attack through Carlos Sanchez. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Santos.
Santos have a goal kick.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 36, At Ilha do Retiro, Iago Maidana has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jobson of Santos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 38, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Yeferson Soteldo (Santos) has received a first yellow card.
Bruninho (Recife PE) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Elton's header is off-target for Recife PE.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Santos are coming forward and Felipe Jonatan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Santos throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Corner awarded to Santos.
Santos's Para misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 43, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bruninho for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Santos at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE's Ricardinho gets in a shot on goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Recife PE's Ricardinho misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Recife.
Santos drive upfield and Marinho gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 45, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Santos drives forward and Kaio Jorge gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Ilha do Retiro.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Santos in Recife.
Tailson is on a sub for Carlos Sanchez for Santos.
Marinho (Santos) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Santos.
In Recife Santos drive forward through Marinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Santos at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 52, Santos are pushing forward but Yeferson Soteldo's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 53, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Santos close to the penalty box.
In the minute 54, Daniel Paulista is making the team's first substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Betinho replacing Jonathan Gomez.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Ronaldo Henrique Silva is replacing Bruninho for the home team.
In the minute 57, Santos have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Santos's Felipe Jonatan breaks free at Ilha do Retiro. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 58, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Santos to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Free kick Santos.
In the minute 62, Santos's Felipe Jonatan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Jean Mota is replacing Jobson for Santos at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Kaio Jorge with Lucas Braga.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior.
Ricardinho (Recife PE) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Santos.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Santos in their own half.
In the minute 67, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a throw-in for Santos, close to Recife PE's area.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Santos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Jean Mota for Santos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Santos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, In Recife Santos attack through Jean Mota. The finish is off target, however.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Recife PE make their third substitution with Philip Luiz Soares da Silva replacing Elton.
In the minute 72, Sander is replacing Luciano for the home team.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Braga is booked for the away team.
In the minute 75, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos at Ilha do Retiro.
Marinho scores to make it 0-1 at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 76, Lucas Braga instrumental with a fine assist.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Santos.
In the minute 79, Free kick Santos.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tailson for Santos who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Recife PE.
In the minute 80, Tailson has recovered and rejoins the match in Recife.
Marcos Leonardo is on a sub for Yeferson Soteldo for Santos.
In the minute 80, Recife PE make their fifth substitution with Hernane Brocador replacing Ricardinho.
Ronaldo Henrique Silva (Recife PE) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Ball goes out of play for a Santos goal kick.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Santos will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Santos.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Iago Maidana (Recife PE) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
In the minute 84, Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Santos in their own half.
In the minute 86, The away team replace Marinho with Alex.
Free kick for Santos in the half of Recife PE.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 89, Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a free kick to Santos.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Recife PE.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Recife.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE's Ronaldo Henrique Silva has run offside.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior signals a Recife PE throw-in in Santos's half.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Santos.
Free kick for Santos in their own half.
Santos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Recife. The final score is 0-1.
Willian Farias for Recife PE has been booked by Jose Mendonca da Silva Junior and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
